revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNDR4500 |revision=v2 |series=N900 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H224 |manuf_rev=T00 |availability=now |fcc_date=11/06/2012 |fcc_id=PY312300207 |ic_id=4054A-12300207 |pcb_id=U12H224T00 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4706 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F1G08U0D-SCB0 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53125 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |tp_firmware=FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=NETGEARXX, NETGEARXX-5G |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$,,, ^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}-5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }} {{TagLine|N900 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNDR4500v2}}
Per the firmware available [ftp://updates1.netgear.com/wndr4500v2/us/ here], has the internal ''[[Foxconn]]'' model of U12H224.
The default SSID patterns seem to be '''NETGEARXX''' and '''NETGEARXX-5G''' again.
===Links=== *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/download/43859/DD-WRT-for-WNDR4500v2/ ''Tathagata Das'''s DD-WRT build for the device] *[http://www.myopenrouter.com/download/discussion/43896/Hardware-rev/ Per ''Tathagata Das'' on myopenrouter.com]... :''V1 and V2 are similar.. there are minor changes in wireless power settings... :but from hardware point of view they are same. BOARD ID are different.''
